LayoutCountButton-False:
QRadioButton{color: #D6D6D6}
QRadioButton::indicator{border: 3px solid #D6D6D6; border-radius: 12px; background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 18px; height: 18px; margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 5px}
QCheckBox-False:
QCheckBox{spacing: 10px; color: #D6D6D6}
QCheckBox::indicator{border: 3px solid #D6D6D6; border-radius: 6px; background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 20px; height: 20px}
QPushButton-True:
QPushButton{border: 3px solid #61136E; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000000}
QPushButton:checked{background-color: #61136E; color: #FFFFFF}
QRadioButton-False:
QRadioButton{color: #D6D6D6}
QRadioButton::indicator{border: 3px solid #D6D6D6; border-radius: 15px; background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 24px; height: 24px; margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 5px}
QSlider-True:
QSlider::groove:vertical{border: 1px solid #000000; width: 4px; background: #000000; margin: 5px}
QSlider::handle:vertical{background: qlineargradient(x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:1, stop:0 #9313A0, stop:1 #2F133C); border: 1px solid #000000; height: 18px; margin: 2px -20px; border-radius: 3px}
QSlider-False:
QSlider::groove:vertical{border: 1px solid #D6D6D6; width: 4px; background: #D6D6D6; margin: 5px}
QSlider::handle:vertical{background: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D6D6D6; height: 18px; margin: 2px -20px; border-radius: 3px}
